location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Sketch Map of Kuwait and Neighbouring Country’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:208 x 172 mm, on sheet 343 x 204 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:Simla Drawing Office, February [19]28.Distinctive Features:Relief shown by hachures.An outline map no. 5289 marked ‘For Official Use only’ showing the north-eastern portion of the Arabian Peninsula with boundaries indicated by dash-dot lines and neutral zones marked. Shows Basrah railway line.
